stories.text:
Guys , i exposed some flaws of duckduckgo but they flagged me in ycombinator.

Don't use ddg 1) Not open source in a nutshell 2) Have cookies in a nutshell but says, they don't have any cookies

Note:- In brave i saw it has 3 cookies i didn't even change setting but still ? Sometimes it shows 0 sometimes 2 cookies sometimes 3 cookies even if i had changed nothing

3)Duckduckgo not the only choice Yes, Duckduckgo is not the only choice there are cool open source alternatives for ddg. Searx( searx.be, search.disroot.org, search.snopyta.org) , Private.sh , whoogle , Jivesearch.

4)When clicked on a add ddg passes your data to the advertiser.

5)Ddg doesn't have instant answers like searx. You can use ddg in searx.

6) https://digdeeper.neocities.org/ghost/search.html

Hope you all understand if i miss any points then reply me:)
stories.title: DuckDuckGo flagged my post on Y Combinator
Ask HN: Any good resources on how to be a great technical advisor to startups?
Classic Blog Posts by Joel Spolsky

stories.text:
This vpns are based on my personal choice.

1)ProtonVpn: -Account needed but can create account using bitcoin payments -Freemium -No Logs -Open Source

2)Mullvaad Huge Advantages: -No logs -Open Source -Account needed but can create account anonymously using bitcoin payments.

3)Ivpn -No logs -Open Source -Runned by security experts -Premium only -US Based -Can create account anonymously using bitcoin.

4)Bitmask VPN: -No logs -Open Source -Completely free (donations) -Account can be created or can use it anonymously. -US Based.

5)Riseup VPN Riseup VPN is a provider of bitmask -No logs -Open source -Completely free -Donation Based -No account -obfs4 proxy available -US Based -Slow for me, i don't know what about you

6)Calyx VPN Calyx VPN too is a provider of bitmask. -No logs -Open Source -No account needed -Has obfs4(bridges) proxy -Donation Based -Slow for me, i don't know about you. -US Based

7)Orbot -No logs -No account -Donation Based -Not a VPN but still secure.

And, if you know any open source vpn then reply me:)
stories.title: Excellent Secure Free VPNs
